compat-change.description: For apps targeting {@link Build.VERSION_CODES#VANILLA_ICE_CREAM} and above, the {@code setNotificationListenerAccessGranted} method will use the user contained within the context. For apps targeting an SDK version below this, the user of the calling process will be used (Process.myUserHandle()).
compat-change.name: SET_LISTENER_ACCESS_GRANTED_IS_USER_AWARE
